biotools.summary: FlowGrid density-based clustering algorithm that can perform fast and accurate clustering on very large scRNA-seq data sets. It can be implemented with Scanpy for fast clustering of Scanpy Anndata.

bioschemas.name: FlowGrid
bioschemas.summary: FlowGrid density-based clustering algorithm that can perform fast and accurate clustering on very large scRNA-seq data sets. It can be implemented with Scanpy for fast clustering of Scanpy Anndata.
